mapper.select: select sui.user_id "userId", sui.user_name "userName", sui.phone_number "phoneNumber", sui.telephone_number "telephoneNumber", sui.fax_number "faxNumber", sui.email, sui.password, sui.status, sui.created_date "createdDate", sui.updated_date "updatedDate", sui.created_user "createdUser", sri.role_id "roleId", sri.role_name "roleName" from sys_user_info sui left join sys_user_role_rel surr on sui.user_id = surr.user_id left join sys_role_info sri on surr.role_id = sri.role_id where sui.user_id = #{userId}

select sui.user_id "userId", sui.user_name "userName", sui.phone_number "phoneNumber", sui.telephone_number "telephoneNumber", sui.fax_number "faxNumber", sui.email, sri.role_name "roleName" from sys_user_info sui left join sys_user_role_rel surr on sui.user_id = surr.user_id left join sys_role_info sri on surr.role_id = sri.role_id where sui.status != '10D'
and sui.user_id like concat('%', #{param.userId}, '%')
and sui.user_name like concat('%', #{param.userName}, '%')
